name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Writify: Enhance tweets, scrape content, and improve Slack messages

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Writify enhances tweets, scrapes content, and improves Slack messages with custom agents for better communication.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Writify is a powerful Chrome extension that helps you:

- Generate authentic tweets and replies that capture your unique voice using AI trained on real tweets

- Scrape and gather thousands of tweets, threads, and conversations for analysis, research, or content curation

- Create customized AI agents for specialized tweet scraping based on your use cases

- Boost engagement and attract new followers with a consistent stream of high-quality, relevant content

Also your OpenAI API token is securely stored using Chrome's storage system, ensuring your data remains protected.

No personal data is collected or shared, maintaining your privacy and security.
